rules_text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}, Exile The Sprawl: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token, a 1/1 blue Insect creature token with flying, a 1/1 red Mercenary creature token with haste, and a 2/2 green Nomad creature token. Then Call the Beast. Activate only as a sorcery.
